To make sure everyone is up-to-date with how the lab works, here is a quick summary:
You need to pass the labs to be able to take the exam.
To pass the labs, out of four mandatory submission exercises two need to be passed.
Deadline for submissions will be mentioned in the sheets.
To submit the solutions for the assignments you can work in a group of up to 4 students.
There will be more than four sheets, not all entail a submission, but are preparing for following assignments.
Some sheets require more work - so the sheets will not be always released weekly. We will announce new exercise sheets on ISIS.
We encourage you to use the

on ISIS as much as 
possible. This will allow us to know, if you are facing any particular 
problem, and we will reply to it as fast as possible.
